subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: By acquiring a pair of first-round draft picks in a trade, the Nets have two more chips to use in a potential blockbuster trade, presumably one involving Carmelo Anthony.
snippet: By acquiring a pair of first-round draft picks in a trade, the Nets have two more chips to use in a potential blockbuster trade, presumably one involving Carmelo Anthony.
